attributes.action: Pay bonuses to students who receive ALG (Adult Learning Grant).
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The household income brackets for financial year 2008-09:

"up to £20,817 - £30 per week

£20,818 - £25,521 - £20 a week

£25,522 - £30,810 - £10 a week

more than £30,810 - no entitlement" Source: direct.gov.uk

The above brackets are used to test both EMA and ALG.


I do not understand how it is fair to only pay bonuses to EMA recipients and not ALG recipients, when their household incomes are the same.

This is putting students aged 19+ at a disadvantage.

Ageism - prejudice or discrimination on the grounds of age. Source: Oxford English Dictionary
